title: Best Drug Rehabilitation Sponsors Manistee Equestrian Team for 2015-16 Show Season
text:
Showing support for the local community and promoting a healthy and positive lifestyle, Best Drug Rehabilitation sponsors the Manistee, MI Equestrian Team.
Manistee, Michigan (PRWEB) October 16, 2015
In an effort to support the local community and to promote the benefits of a healthy and active lifestyle, Best Drug Rehabilitation, a holistic treatment center for substance abuse located in Manistee, MI, has sponsored the Manistee Equestrian Team for the 2015-2016 Show Season. As part of the Michigan Interscholastic Horsemanship Association (MIHA), the Manistee Equestrian Team, a Division D team (divisions are separated by the number of riders on each team), is invited to competitions around Michigan throughout the year.
“Community support has always and will always remain one of our top priorities,” commented Best Drug Rehabilitation founder Per Wickstrom. “In recovery from addiction, it is vital that our patients learn the importance of giving back to others and to the community that they call home. And, since actions speak louder than words, it is equally as important that we lead by example and show our patients that donating time and effort to others can truly be the more rewarding opportunity. We wish the Manistee Equestrian Team the best of luck in their upcoming competition, and look forward to them bringing first prize back home.”
The Manistee Equestrian Team
The Manistee Equestrian Team is comprised of sisters Shanna and Chelsey Tetzlaff as the two riders, coached by Shannon Tetzlaff and assisted by Sharla Tetzlaff, also sisters. In the past few years, this small family team has made strong showings in competitions, making it to state level on three different occasions. In two of those showings they placed third, and fourth in another. As the current show season has progressed, the Manistee team has sat in first place in the district in their division, and recently won the title in the regional competition held in Ludington, MI, on October 3rd-4th. They are now eligible to compete in the State Finals in Midland, MI on October 15th-18th.
About Best Drug Rehabilitation
As a leading provider of effective substance abuse treatment programs, Best Drug Rehabilitation strives to make a difference in the world around us. With various program options for the patients to choose from, the recovery strategy at BDR is designed to be adaptable to any person that comes to their doors seeking help in overcoming their substance abuse issues. Concentrating on healing the individual as a whole, the Best Drug Rehabilitation program focuses on getting the Mind, Body and Spirit of the patient healthy and working in harmony with one another for a truly thorough and long-lasting recovery from addiction.
For more information contact http://www.bestdrugrehabilitation.com .
